Agony.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Rend Soul now applies a 1.5s stun to the victim when they are afflicted with 4 Soul Charges.

Bane.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Every Soul Charge you detonate reduces the Cooldown of Restore Soul by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Blood Pact.card_desc: [Restore Soul] While channeling Restore Soul you heal yourself for {scale=70|70} Health per second.

Dark Sight.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Activating Rend Soul restores {scale=2|2} ammunition

Dark Whisper.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Increase your movement speed in Shadow Travel by {scale=20|20}%

Dusk Walker.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Reduce the Cooldown of Shadow Travel by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Essence Rip.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Rend Soul heals you for {scale=8|8}% more.

Fade to Black.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Activating Restore Soul reduces the Cooldown of Shadow Travel by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Mortal Reach.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Increase the range of Restore Soul by 300% and the Duration by 1s.

Nether Siphon.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health every second while in Shadow Travel.

Soul Collector.card_desc: [Weapon] Each Soul Charge you detonate increases your Base Health and Weapon Damage by 2% until you die. Stacks up to 15 times.

Soul Forge.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Restore Soul by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Spirit Leech.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Every Second channeling Restore Soul generates {scale=2|2} ammo.

Umbral Gait.card_desc: [Weapon] If an enemy is affected with a Soul Charge you move {scale=8|8}% faster

Veil.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Reduce the cast time of Shadow Travel by {scale=15|15}%

Wickedness.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Rend Soul by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Blutpakt.card_desc: [Seelenerneuerung] Während du Seelenerneuerung kanalisierst, wirst du {scale=70|70} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

D\u00e4mmerungsl\u00e4ufer.card_desc: [Schattenreise] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schattenreise um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Dunkles Gefl\u00fcster.card_desc: [Schattenreise] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Schattenreise um {scale=20|20}%.

Essenzenriss.card_desc: [Seelenriss] Erhöht die Heilung durch Seelenriss um {scale=8|8}%.

Geisterschuss.card_desc: [Seelenerneuerung] Während du Seelenerneuerung kanalisierst, wird jede Sekunde {scale=2|2} Munition erzeugt.

H\u00f6llenqual.card_desc: [Seelenriss] Seelenriss betäubt Gegner mit 4 Seelenladungen nun 1,5s lang.

Jenseitsfresser.card_desc: [Schattenreise] Während Schattenreise wirst du jede Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Schattengang.card_desc: [Waffe] Trägt ein Gegner eine Seelenladung, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo um {scale=8|8}%.

Schleier.card_desc: [Schattenreise] Reduziert die Aktivierungszeit von Schattenreise um {scale=15|15}%.

Schwarzsicht.card_desc: [Seelenriss] Die Aktivierung von Seelenriss erzeugt {scale=2|2} Munition.

Seelensammlung.card_desc: [Waffe] Basis-LP und Waffenschaden werden pro detonierter Seelenladung um 2% erhöht. Bis zu 15 Stapel, gehen bei Tod verloren.

Seelenschmiede.card_desc: [Seelenerneuerung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Seelenerneuerung um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

T\u00f6dlicher Griff.card_desc: [Seelenerneuerung] Erhöht die Reichweite von Seelenerneuerung um 300% und die Dauer um 1s.

Verderben.card_desc: [Seelenriss] Jede detonierte Seelenladung reduziert die Abklingzeit von Seelenerneuerung um {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Verf\u00e4rbung.card_desc: [Seelenerneuerung] Die Aktivierung von Seelenerneuerung reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schattenreise um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Verruchtheit.card_desc: [Seelenriss] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Seelenriss um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Wiederg\u00e4nger.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

\u00c0 la vie \u00e0 la mort.card_desc: [Guérison spirit.] Pendant Guérison spirituelle, vous récupérez {scale=70|70} PV par seconde.

Agonie.card_desc: [Âme en pièces] Âme en pièces étourdit pendant 1,5s les cibles affectées par 4 charges d'âme.

D\u00e9chirure d'\u00e2me.card_desc: [Âme en pièces] Âme en pièces vous rend {scale=8|8}% de PV en plus.

Entre chien et loup.card_desc: [Voyage sombre] Voyage sombre se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Forge d'\u00e2me.card_desc: [Guérison spirit.] Guérison spirituelle se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Malice.card_desc: [Âme en pièces] Âme en pièces se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Murmure de la nuit.card_desc: [Voyage sombre] Pendant Voyage sombre, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=20|20}%.

Peste.card_desc: [Âme en pièces] Chaque charge d'âme qui explose réduit le temps de recharge de Guérison spirituelle de {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Port\u00e9e mortelle.card_desc: [Guérison spirit.] La portée de Guérison spirituelle augmente de 300% et sa durée de 1s.

R\u00e9cup\u00e9ration d'\u00e2mes.card_desc: [Arme] Faire exploser une charge d'âme augmente de 2% vos PV max. ainsi que les dégâts de votre arme. Effet cumulable jusqu'à 15 charges.

Sangsue de l'\u00e2me.card_desc: [Guérison spirit.] Guérison spirituelle redonne {scale=2|2} munitions par seconde.

Siphon des t\u00e9n\u00e8bres.card_desc: [Voyage sombre] Pendant Voyage sombre, vous récupérez {scale=50|50} PV par seconde.

Sombre allure.card_desc: [Arme] Quand un ennemi est affecté par une charge d'âme, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Sorci\u00e8re.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

Tomb\u00e9e de la nuit.card_desc: [Guérison spirit.] Activer Guérison spirituelle réduit le temps de recharge de Voyage sombre de {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Vision sombre.card_desc: [Âme en pièces] Activer Âme en pièces redonne {scale=2|2} munitions.

Voile.card_desc: [Voyage sombre] Le délai d'activation de Voyage sombre est réduit de {scale=15|15}%.

\u4ea1\u9b42\u9644\u4f53.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u51e1\u4eba\u4e4b\u89e6.card_desc: [灵魂复苏] 灵魂复苏的施法距离提高300%，持续时间提高1秒

\u5929\u964d\u707e\u7978.card_desc: [灵魂撕裂] 每引爆一层灵魂充能，灵魂复苏的冷却时间就会缩短{scale=0.2|0.2}秒

\u5e7d\u51a5\u8679\u5438.card_desc: [暗影穿行] 暗影穿行期间每秒回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u5f02\u754c\u5973\u5deb.card_desc: [武器] 武器装填速度提高{scale=7|7}%

\u6444\u9b42\u672f.card_desc: [灵魂复苏] 灵魂复苏引导期间，每秒回复{scale=2|2}发弹药

\u6697\u5f71\u8be1\u8bed.card_desc: [暗影穿行] 暗影穿行期间移动速度提高{scale=20|20}%

\u7075\u9b42\u6536\u96c6\u8005.card_desc: [武器] 每次引爆灵魂充能都能使你的最大生命值和普通攻击提高2%，最多叠加8次。叠加的效果在死亡时消失

\u7075\u9b42\u7194\u7089.card_desc: [灵魂复苏] 灵魂复苏的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u75db\u82e6\u7206\u53d1.card_desc: [灵魂撕裂] 灵魂撕裂现在会对带有4层灵魂充能的目标造成1.5秒的眩晕效果

\u795e\u79d8\u9762\u7eb1.card_desc: [暗影穿行] 暗影穿行的施法时间缩短{scale=15|15}%

\u7cbe\u534e\u6c72\u53d6.card_desc: [灵魂撕裂] 灵魂撕裂为你带来的治疗效果提高{scale=8|8}%

\u8840\u4e4b\u5951\u7ea6.card_desc: [灵魂复苏] 引导灵魂复苏时，自身每秒回复{scale=70|70}点生命值

\u9041\u5165\u9ed1\u6697.card_desc: [灵魂复苏] 使用灵魂复苏会使暗影穿行的冷却时间降低{scale=0.8|0.8}秒

\u90aa\u6076\u4e4b\u7075.card_desc: [灵魂撕裂] 灵魂撕裂的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u9634\u9b42\u4e0d\u6563.card_desc: [武器] 当敌人带有灵魂充能效果时，你的移动速度提高{scale=8|8}%

\u9ec4\u660f\u884c\u8005.card_desc: [暗影穿行] 暗影穿行的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u9ed1\u6697\u89c6\u754c.card_desc: [灵魂撕裂] 在引爆灵魂充能时会对目标附加追踪效果，持续{scale=1|1}秒

Agon\u00eda.card_desc: [Arrancar almas] Arrancar almas ahora aplica un aturdimiento de 1,5s al objetivo cuando es afectado por 4 cargas de alma.

Alcance mortal.card_desc: [Restaurar almas] Aumenta el alcance de Restaurar almas un 300% y la duración en 1s.

Aparici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu salud máxima en {scale=50|50} PS.

Caminante crepuscular.card_desc: [Viaje sombrío] Se reduce la recarga de Viaje sombrío en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Coleccionista de almas.card_desc: [Arma] Cada carga de almas que detonas aumenta tu salud básica y el daño de armas un 2% hasta que mueres. Se acumula hasta 15 veces.

Dinamo eben\u00e1ceo.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta tu cantidad de munición en {scale=2|2}

Forja de alma.card_desc: [Restaurar almas] Se reduce la recarga de Restaurar almas en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Maldad.card_desc: [Arrancar almas] Se reduce la recarga de Arrancar almas en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Oscurecer.card_desc: [Restaurar almas] Activar Restaurar almas reduce la recarga de Viaje sombrío en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Pacto de sangre.card_desc: [Restaurar almas] Mientras canalizas Restaurar almas, te curas {scale=70|70} PS por segundo.

Paso sombr\u00edo.card_desc: [Arma] Si un enemigo es afectado por Carga de alma te mueves un {scale=8|8}% más rápido

Rasg\u00f3n de esencia.card_desc: [Arrancar almas] Arrancar almas te cura un {scale=8|8}% más.

Ruina.card_desc: [Arrancar almas] Cada carga de alma que detones reduce la recarga de Restaurar almas en {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Sanguijuela espiritual.card_desc: [Restaurar almas] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición cada segundo que canalizas Restaurar almas.

Succi\u00f3n inferior.card_desc: [Viaje sombrío] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS cada segundo durante Viaje sombrío.

Susurro misterioso.card_desc: [Viaje sombrío] Aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento en Viaje sombrío un {scale=20|20}%

Velo.card_desc: [Viaje sombrío] Reduce el tiempo de lanzamiento de Viaje sombrío un {scale=15|15}%.

Vista oscura.card_desc: [Arrancar almas] Activar Arrancar almas restaura {scale=2|2} de munición.

Agonia.card_desc: [Alma da Danação] A Alma da Danação agora atordoa por 1,5s uma vítima quando ela está carregada com 4 almas.

Alcance Mortal.card_desc: [Alma de Cura] Aumenta o alcance da Alma de Cura em 300% e sua duração em 1s.

Amargura.card_desc: [Alma da Danação] Cada carga de alma que você detonar reduz o intervalo da Alma de Cura em {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Andarilha Madrigal.card_desc: [Viagem nas Sombras] Reduz o intervalo da Viagem nas Sombras em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Caminhante Sombria.card_desc: [Arma] Se um inimigo for afetado com uma carga de alma você se move {scale=8|8}% mais rápido.

Colec\u00e3o de Almas.card_desc: [Arma] Cada alma detonada aumenta sua vida base e o dano do seu disparo em 2% até você morrer. Estoca até 15 almas.

D\u00ednamo Negro.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=2|2} a quantidade de munição.

Especialista em Almas.card_desc: [Alma de Cura] A cada segundo em que estiver sendo canalizada, Alma de Cura gera {scale=2|2} de munição.

Feiticeira.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=7|7}%.

Forja da Alma.card_desc: [Alma de Cura] Reduz o intervalo da Alma de Cura em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Obscurecer.card_desc: [Alma de Cura] Ativar a Alma de Cura reduz o intervalo da Viagem nas Sombras em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Pacto de Sangue.card_desc: [Alma de Cura] Enquanto estiver canalizando a Alma de Cura você se cura em {scale=70|70} por segundo.

Perversidade.card_desc: [Alma da Danação] Reduz o intervalo da Alma da Danação em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Rasgo da Alma.card_desc: [Alma da Danação] Alma da Danação cura você {scale=8|8}% mais.

Rediviva.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima base em {scale=50|50}.

Sif\u00e3o Infernal.card_desc: [Viagem nas Sombras] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} a cada segundo em que estiver na Viagem nas Sombras.

Sussurro Sombrio.card_desc: [Viagem nas Sombras] Aumenta em {scale=20|20}% sua velocidade de movimento durante Viagem nas Sombras.

V\u00e9u.card_desc: [Viagem nas Sombras] Reduz o tempo de ativação de Viagem nas Sombras em {scale=15|15}%.

Vis\u00e3o Sombria.card_desc: [Alma da Danação] Ativar a Alma da Danação restaura {scale=2|2} de munição

\u0410\u0433\u043e\u043d\u0438\u044f.card_desc: [Разрыв души] Разрыв души теперь оглушает врага на 1,5 с., если тот находится под воздействием 4 зарядов души.

\u0410\u0434\u0441\u043a\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Странствие тени] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду во время действия Странствия тени.

\u0412\u0443\u0430\u043b\u044c.card_desc: [Странствие тени] Скорость активации Странствия тени увеличивается на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0413\u043b\u0430\u0437\u0430 \u0434\u0.card_desc: [Разрыв души] Активация Разрыва души восстанавливает {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0414\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0430 \u0.card_desc: [Оружие] При наложении на врага Заряда души ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0417\u043b\u043e\u0434\u0435\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Разрыв души] Перезарядка Разрыва души сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041a\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Возвращение души] Возвращение души исцеляет вас на {scale=70|70} ед. в секунду.

\u041a\u0443\u0437\u043d\u0438\u0446\u04.card_desc: [Возвращение души] Перезарядка Возвращения души сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041c\u0440\u0430\u0447\u043d\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Странствие тени] Ваша скорость передвижения во время Странствия тени увеличивается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041d\u0430\u0432\u0430\u0436\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043b \u0.card_desc: [Разрыв души] Разрыв души исцеляет вас на {scale=8|8}% больше.

\u0420\u0443\u043a\u0430 \u0441\u043c\u0.card_desc: [Возвращение души] Радиус действия Возвращения души увеличивается на 300%, а длительность – на 1 с.

\u0421\u043e\u0431\u0438\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Каждый взорванный Заряд души увеличивает ваше базовое здоровье и урон от оружия на 2%, пока вы не умрете. Суммируется до 15 раз.

\u0423\u0433\u0430\u0441\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Возвращение души] Активация Возвращения души сокращает перезарядку Странствия тени на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u0423\u043d\u0438\u0447\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Возвращение души] Возвращение души генерирует {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов каждую секунду.

\u0427\u0443\u043c\u0430.card_desc: [Разрыв души] Каждый взорванный Заряд души сокращает перезарядку Возвращения души на {scale=0.2|0.2} с.

\u0428\u0430\u0433\u0438 \u0432 \u0442\u.card_desc: [Странствие тени] Перезарядка Странствия тени сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

Agonia.card_desc: [Rozdarcie duszy] Rozdarcie duszy ogłusza przeciwnika na 1,5 s, jeśli wpływają na niego 4 ładunki dusz.

Duchowy wzrok.card_desc: [Rozdarcie duszy] Aktywacja Rozdarcia duszy przywraca {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji.

Kolekcjoner dusz.card_desc: [Broń] Zdetonowane Ładunki dusz zwiększają podstawowe PZ oraz obrażenia od broni o 2% za ładunek aż do śmierci. Efekt kumuluje się do 15 razy.

Krocz\u0105c o zmierzchu.card_desc: [Podróż w cieniu] Skraca czas odnowienia Podróży w cieniu o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Krok cienia.card_desc: [Broń] Jeśli wróg jest pod efektem Ładunku dusz, poruszasz się o {scale=8|8}% szybciej.

Ku\u017ania dusz.card_desc: [Przywrócenie duszy] Skraca czas odnowienia Przywrócenia duszy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Mroczny szept.card_desc: [Podróż w cieniu] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu w Podróży w cieniu o {scale=20|20}%.

Odchodz\u0105c w cie\u0144.card_desc: [Przywrócenie duszy] Przywrócenie duszy skraca czas odnowienia Podróży w cieniu o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Pod\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Rozdarcie duszy] Skraca czas odnowienia Rozdarcia o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Przymierze krwi.card_desc: [Przywrócenie duszy] Leczysz się o {scale=70|70} PZ na sekundę podczas korzystania Przywrócenia duszy.

Rozerwanie duszy.card_desc: [Rozdarcie duszy] Rozdarcie leczy o {scale=8|8}% PZ więcej.

\u015amiertelny dotyk.card_desc: [Przywrócenie dusz] Zwiększa zasięg przywrócenia dusz o 300%, a jego trwanie o 1 s.

Wir otch\u0142ani.card_desc: [Podróż w cieniu] Każda sekunda Podróży w cieniu przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ.

Wysysanie duszy.card_desc: [Przywrócenie duszy] Każda sekunda rzucania Przywrócenia duszy generuje {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji.

Zas\u0142ona.card_desc: [Podróż w cieniu] Skraca czas rzucenia Podróży w cieniu o {scale=15|15}%.

Zguba.card_desc: [Rozdarcie duszy] Każdy zdetonowany Ładunek dusz skraca czas odnowienia Przywrócenia duszy o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Zjawa.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Afet.card_desc: [Ruh Parçalaması] Patlattığın her Ruh Yüklemesi, Ruh Yenilemesi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.2|0.2} sn azaltır.

Cehennem Hortumu.card_desc: [Gölge Gezintisi] Gölge Gezintisi sırasında saniyede {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

G\u00f6lge Y\u00fcr\u00fcy\u00fc\u015f\u.card_desc: [Silah] Bir düşman, Ruh Yüklemesi'nden etkilenirse %{scale=8|8} daha hızlı hareket edersin.

Ist\u0131rap.card_desc: [Ruh Parçalaması] Ruh Parçalaması artık 4 Ruh Yüklemesi ile etkilendiğinde kurbana 1,5 sn Sersemletme uygular.

Kan And\u0131.card_desc: [Ruh Yenileme] Ruh Yenileme'yi kullanırken, kendini saniyede {scale=70|70} Can iyileştirirsin.

Karanl\u0131k \u00c7\u00f6k\u00fcyor.card_desc: [Ruh Yenileme] Ruh Yenileme'yi etkinleştirmek Gölge Gezintisi'nin Bekleme Süresini her saniye {scale=0.8|0.8} sn azaltır.
